article_title: Yael T. Abouhalkah: Gov. Sam Brownback’s tax-cut dumpster fire now threatens Missouri, too
article_text:
GOP politicians looking at annual $1 billion reduction in revenues

That could harm state services

Just look next door at the huge mess tax cuts created in Kansas

article_metadata.news-keywords: tax, cuts, brownback, schmitt, billion, dollar, schools, roads, opinion
article_metadata.title: Yael T. Abouhalkah: Gov. Sam Brownback’s tax-cut dumpster fire now threatens Missouri, too | The Kansas City Star

og.description: It’s almost as if Missouri state Sen. Eric Schmitt and all the others in the GOP tax-cut camp have blinders on. They can’t see what a dumpster fire the Kansas budget has become in recent years because of large income tax reductions pushed by Gov. Sam Brownback.
og.title: Yael T. Abouhalkah: Gov. Sam Brownback’s tax-cut dumpster fire now threatens Missouri, too
